title: I am staying in Qatar, I am a big fan of google pixel phones and I want a Google pixel 4 XL
content: Sir, I am Rahul, an Indian presently staying in Qatar. I am really excited when I heard about the Google pixel 4 and 4 XL many months before. But when it launched, I realised that it's not easy to get that premium phone of Google if I am staying in Qatar or in India. Can you help me to get it anyway.?
